short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveal the real prices of your purchases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Worthwhile to take a peek at the real price you are paying.

Sometimes we focus too much on the commercial value of a product but forget how much that actually costs us.

This extension is an experimental measurement taken against our overconsumptions and impulsive purchases.
